StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SearchSITREPs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgUnitID int = 0, @StartDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @FiscalYear int ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED IF (@FiscalYear = 2011) BEGIN SELECT ap.ApplicantPackageID, --added to preserve uniqueness ap.ApplicantPackageTypeID AS PackageType, pg.PayGradeType AS PayGradeType, ap.DateJoinCredit AS DateUpdated, CASE WHEN ap.MOSMatchTypeID = 6 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS OpenQSN FROM [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] ap INNER JOIN [dbo].[QSN] q ON q.QSNID = ap.QSNID INNER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackageType] apt ON apt.ApplicantPackageTypeID = ap.ApplicantPackageTypeID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Lead] l ON ap.LeadID = l.LeadID INNER JOIN [dbo].[LeadStatusDisposi.on] lsd ON ap.LeadID = lsd.LeadID INNER JOIN [dbo].[StatusDisposi.on] sd ON lsd.StatusDisposi.onID = sd.StatusDisposi.onID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Status] st ON st.StatusID = sd.StatusID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PayGrade] pg ON pg.PayGradeID = q.PayGradeID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON l.AtachedPSRSSID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS WHERE ap.DateJoinCredit >= @StartDate AND ap.DateJoinCredit <= @EndDate AND q.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear AND lsd.StatusDisposi.onID in (16,28,29,34,35,36,37,38) AND ( orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0 ) union
select NEWID() as ApplicantPackageID, ApplicantPackageTypeID as PackageType, PayGradeType, DateOfJoin as DateUpdated, CASE WHEN IsOpen = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS OpenQSN from dbo.vwFiscalYearJoins2011 LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON vwFiscalYearJoins2011.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS WHERE DateOfJoin >= @StartDate AND DateOfJoin < @EndDate AND StatusID = 6 AND ( orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0 ) END ELSE BEGIN SELECT ap.ApplicantPackageID, --added to preserve uniqueness ap.ApplicantPackageTypeID AS PackageType, pg.PayGradeType AS PayGradeType, ap.DateJoinCredit AS DateUpdated, CASE WHEN ap.MOSMatchTypeID = 6 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS OpenQSN FROM [dbo].[ApplicantPackage] ap INNER JOIN [dbo].[QSN] q ON q.QSNID = ap.QSNID INNER JOIN [dbo].[ApplicantPackageType] apt ON apt.ApplicantPackageTypeID = ap.ApplicantPackageTypeID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Lead] l ON ap.LeadID = l.LeadID INNER JOIN [dbo].[LeadStatusDisposi.on] lsd ON ap.LeadID = lsd.LeadID INNER JOIN [dbo].[StatusDisposi.on] sd ON lsd.StatusDisposi.onID = sd.StatusDisposi.onID INNER JOIN [dbo].[Status] st ON st.StatusID = sd.StatusID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PayGrade] pg ON pg.PayGradeID = q.PayGradeID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON l.AtachedPSRSSID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS WHERE ap.DateJoinCredit >= @StartDate AND ap.DateJoinCredit <= @EndDate AND q.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear AND lsd.StatusDisposi.onID in (16,28,29,34,35,36,37,38) AND ( orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0 ) END
